coza.opencollab.synthesis.sakai.client

Interface ResourcesService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResourcesServiceImpl

    public interface ResourcesService
    Service to retrieve resource tool data from the Sakai LMS
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    OpenCollab

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getResource(String sessionId, String resourceId)
      Get a specific resource tool item, when given the session Id and the resource id
      String getResourceData(String sessionId, String resourceId)
      To get the actual resource data (file,link,etc) , provide the sessionId and resourceId
      String getResourcesForSite(String sessionId, String siteId, Date fromDate)
      Get all resource tool data for a module (Sakai site) given the sessionId , siteId and the fromDate.
      String getResourceURL(String sessionId, String resourceId)
      To get the resource URL , provide the sessionId and resourceId

    • Method Detail

      • getResourcesForSite

        String getResourcesForSite(String sessionId,
                         String siteId,
                         Date fromDate)
                           throws Exception
        Get all resource tool data for a module (Sakai site) given the sessionId , siteId and the fromDate. If the fromDate is null all resource tool data will be returned
        Parameters:
        sessionId - a String object.
        siteId - a String object.
        fromDate - a Date object.
        Returns:
        a String object.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any.
